reviewText: I bought this movie for the dog as I used to show Belgians, but was pleasantly surprised that it was a fun, fairly well done kid-friendly show.  Good job keeping the story moving and the child actors were good.  Fairly predictible, but still a good adventure that kids and adults will enjoy.  Good values represented, except for kids who just can't stay out of trouble!
Great family video for younger families.
Great family movie no junk to worry about
This was a good movie. Entertaining, good story, and good family values.
Very interesting story.  Would recommend to anyone.  Gotta love the animals.

Thoroughly enjoyed this fun K-9 adventure.  You might also want to get the first movie Scoot and Kassie's Christmas Adventure.  They are both really clean, fun movies for kids and adults. I hope they continue making these with the same group of kids and main characters, but a little sooner than every 3 years, the kids will grow up too fast.  Make another one sooooon! Highly recommend.
Perfect family flick.  My kids loved this movie.  It is great for family watching.  Clean and appropriate.  A bit of a yawner for grownups but my 10, 11 and 14 year old thought it was great.
The kids really loved this movie!  I like it because it's a good, clean movie
Terrible. Kids watched about 20 minutes before becoming bored.

A good family movie. Has enough fun and adventure to keep it interesting. Anyone considering K-9 should also consider "Scoot & Kassie's Christmas Adventure". Scoot features most of the same cast (including the dog).Loved both of them.
